categories: Category:Battles of the Hunt for the Sith Emperor

nodes.text: Skirmish in the Jundland Wastes canyon

Around 3642 BBY, at the beginning of the Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, the Hero of Tython and a companion fought a group of Harrower assassins sent to kill the crashed Jedi Knight Jomar Chul on the planet Tatooine. Chul, who had been scouting the Dromund system, had been shot down over Tatooine and pursued by the Harrowers, which were Sithspawn servants of the Sith Emperor.
